query:

h1. A biblical place
h2. Relating to sheep
h3. A woodland
h4. Anatomically on the inside
h5. A realm
v1. A person or instrument that cuts down
v2. To happen
v3. A lariat; a lasso
v4. An Irish doctor
v5. To meddle; to mix
